package.name: Validate_IE
package.description: Package contains validation for Irish credentials: - PostalCodes (hoax) - Passport Numbers - Phone Numbers - Bank Account Numbers - swift codes - IBAN codes - Drivers Licence Numbers - PPSN / SSN Numbers - Swift numbers
package.notes: * Fix Bug #11444: postal codes: validate existing Dublin postal codes [kguest] * Fix Bug #11474: validate_IE_post_code.phpt not linked in package_IE.xml [kguest] * Fix Bug #11506: licensePlate test fails ZZ and ZV codes. [kguest] * Fix Bug #11515: PPSN isn't valid if the modulus 23 checksum doesn't match [kguest] * Fix Bug #11531: using phpcs [php codesniffer] highlights a multitude of CS errors. [kguest] * Fix Bug #11706: invalid VAT numbers are marked as Ok by vat validation function [kguest] * Fix Bug #11712: checkMOD23 buggy. IE6572557W is a valid vat number. [kguest] * Fix Bug #11719: old style vat numbers, which are still in use, are not marked as valid [kguest] * Fix Bug #11726: IE_postcodes.txt not installed/included in package.xml [kguest] * Fix Bug #11730: IBAN tests failing on fresh install of package [kguest] * Fix Bug #11737: tests of functions using @DATADIR@ need to work when tests run from CVS. [kguest] * Implement Feature #11477: package doesn't validate license plates [kguest] * Implement Feature #11522: package should validate VAT numbers [kguest]

release.notes: We have fixed a few design bugs, and now with this release, we have implemented many new features that were on the roadmap.
